page.title: 20Sailing in Start Bay.
page.content: Our boat Venn is a 21 ft Cinder and has a mooring just down from the Higher Ferry.It has no reg.no.because we do not do any racing in it,and dad says it is too expensive.We also have a 10ft dinghy with a cuddy,and an inflatable dinghy.One Sunday I went sailing.For a time I took the helm.I steered it out to sea.It was very good weather for sailing,we kept on heeling over,and we were sailing at 7-8 knots. We were going out to Start Bay but by Slapton Sands,I chickened out because we were heeling over too much,so we turned back.When we were going past Mill Bay Cove we spotted a Fisherman 17 For Hire boat with an outboard motor which had broken down, and was slowly drifting out to sea.So we towed them as far as the yacht moorings.The boat-hire man came,and said the sheering pin had gone.
